Creators Arunabh Kumar. Sameer Saxena

Directed by Rajesh Krishnan. Sameer Saxena. Neeraj Udhwani

Written by Sumeet Vyas. Akarsh Khurana. Shivam Aggarwal. Abbas Dalal. Arunabh Kumar. Sameer Saxena

Cast Sumeet Vyas( Chandan / …14 episodes, 2016-2022 ). Maanvi Gagroo( Chanchal / …14 episodes, 2016-2022 ). Amol Parashar( Chitwan / …14 episodes, 2016-2022 ). Kunaal Roy Kapur( Pranav10 episodes, 2016-2022 ). Kumud Mishra( Chinmay / …7 episodes, 2016-2022 ). Shernaz Patel( Charu / …7 episodes, 2016-2022 ). Nidhi Bisht( Bhabhisa / …4 episodes, 2016-2019 ). Kubbra Sait( Advocate Sheetal Gujral / …4 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Sarah Anjuli( Paula4 episodes, 2022 ). Prabuddh Dyma( Sudheer3 episodes, 2022 ). Jitendra Kumar( Actor2 episodes, 2019 ). Kallirroi Tziafeta( Shoshana / …2 episodes, 2016 ). Gallina( Yael2 episodes, 2016 ). Maria( Talia2 episodes, 2016 ). Karishma Singh( Kritika2 episodes, 2022 ). Gajraj Rao( Nawab Sikandar Khan / …1 episode, 2019 ). Yash Bhojwani( Young Chandan1 episode, 2019 ). Shivankit Singh Parihar( Service Station Attendant1 episode, 2016 ). Shweta Tripathi( Zainab1 episode, 2019 ). Pratyaksh Panwar( Young Chitwan1 episode, 2019 ). Sarang Sathaye( Marco Polo1 episode, 2016 ). Anant Singh( Club Manager1 episode, 2016 ). Mahnaz Damania( Payal1 episode, 2016 ). Riva Arora( Young Chanchal1 episode, 2019 ). Akarsh Khurana( Director1 episode, 2019 ). Jitendra Shastri( Chilla1 episode, 2019 ). Rajeev Pathak( Party Chairman1 episode, 2019 ). Cécile Jeanneret-Amour( Chelsea1 episode, 2016 ). Jasmeet Singh Bhatia( Commissioner1 episode, 2016 ). Harman Wadala( Debu Watchman1 episode, 2016 ). Rita Rozer( Snooty Aunty1 episode, 2016 ). Mushtaq Khan( Hari Bhai1 episode, 2019 ). Ilesh Shah( Police Constable1 episode, 2019 ). Ankit Chandrashekar( Reporter1 episode, 2019 ). Vaidehi( Girl in dhaba1 episode, 2016 ). Vijay Rajoria( Chitvan’s critic1 episode, 2016 ). Pramod( Sardar1 episode, 2016 ). Mohd Talib( Chandan friend1 episode, 2019 ). Tripti Thakur( Poulomi1 episode, 2019 ). Jigar Bundela( Party Member1 episode, 2019 ). Rajesh Krishnan( Tharki uncle1 episode, 2016 ). Rajit Kapoor( Detective / …1 episode, 2019 ). Abhilash Shah( Guard 11 episode, 2019 ). Aarish Pathan( Cheetah1 episode, 2019 ). Jay Bhatt( Guard 21 episode, 2019 ). Rajeev Masand( Self (Talk Show Host)1 episode, 2019 ). Narendra Joshi( Man Showing Direction1 episode, 2019 ). Paras Chaurasia( Lit Festival Host1 episode, 2019 ). Arun Kumar( Guard 31 episode, 2019 ). Francisco Raymond( Author1 episode, 2019 ). Rajesh Barsiwal( Man Playing Cards1 episode, 2019 ). Prasad Reddy( A kid at Jaipur book fair festival1 episode, 2019 ). Vikas Gupta( Man Playing Cards1 episode, 2019 ). Kailash Pal( Man Playing Cards1 episode, 2019 ). Vishal Gupta( Movie Reviewer1 episode, 2019 ). Piyush Vijay( Party Table attendant1 episode, 2019 ). Yash Kumar( Kidnapper1 episode, 2019 ). Simran Sharma( Nanny1 episode, 2022 ). Hemant Kumar( Abhimanyu1 episode, 2022 ). Kunal Shukla( The Vegetable Seller1 episode, 2022 ). Monnica Rae Laher( British Journalist1 episode, 2022 ). Ulhas Sule( Judge1 episode, 2022 ). Shivani Thorat( Secretary1 episode, 2022 ). Aaditya Vardhan Pareek( Cheetah1 episode, 2022 ). Manoj Malik( Royal Guard1 episode, 2022 ). Vimal Tomar( The Fencing Guy1 episode, 2022 ). Akhtar Siddiqui( The Waiter1 episode, 2022 )

Language Hindi

Producers Shreyansh Pandey. Arun Kumar. Arunabh Kumar. Tabassum Modi. Vaibhav Modi. Mehboob Pal Singh Brar. Ibrahim Hamdan. Srusti Jain. H.N Sharma Jodhpur. Smruti Choudhury. Ronit Deb. Mitesh Dubey. Vijay Koshy. Vivek Kumar. Shivani Sinha. Shaffi Ismail. Percy Jamshedji. Kuntal Loonker. Sameer Saxena. Chandresh Bhatt. Arurabh Kumar

Production Contagious Online Media Network. The Viral Fever.

Official sites Official Facebook Official Website – SonyLIV

Season 3

Total Episodes 5
